author: wn.com
title: Better guardianship key to better protection for child victims of trafficking (FRA - Fundamental Rights ...
text: ( Source : FRA - Fundamental Rights Agency ) ' Children deprived of parental care are at heightened risk of trafficking. Guardianship can help to prevent trafficking, protect children and enable them to exercise their rights,' says EU
